mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM BOOK ORDER BY BRDATE DESC) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM BOOK ORDER BY BTITLE) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK (BNO, BTITLE, BWRITER, BRDATE, BIMG1, BIMG2, BINFO) VALUES (BOOK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{btitle}, #{bwriter}, #{brdate}, #{bimg1}, #{bimg2}, #{binfo})
